data.title: GoldArc Resources Ltd Reports Successful Rebranding and High-Grade Gold Discoveries
data.description:
The latest announcement is out from Asra Minerals Limited ( (AU:GA8) ).

GoldArc Resources Ltd underwent a significant transformation this quarter, marked by a successful rebranding and capital restructuring, including a 10-for-1 share consolidation and a A$3.2 million placement to investors. The company reported substantial progress in its exploration efforts, with high-grade gold discoveries at the Leonora South Gold Project, including promising results from the Eclipse and Gladstone Prospects. These developments are expected to enhance GoldArc’s market positioning and offer substantial growth potential for stakeholders.

More about Asra Minerals Limited

GoldArc Resources Ltd, formerly known as Asra Minerals Ltd, operates in the mining industry with a focus on gold exploration and development. The company is engaged in significant exploration activities at its flagship Leonora Gold Projects in Western Australia.

YTD Price Performance: 138.10%

Average Trading Volume: 3,000,683

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: A$28.38M

data.title: Fortuna Metals Director Increases Stake Following Acquisition
data.description:
Frontier Resources Limited ( (AU:FUN) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Fortuna Metals Ltd has announced a change in the interest of its director, Peter Pawlowitsch, who has acquired additional securities. The acquisition includes 5,000,000 fully paid ordinary shares, 2,500,000 Class A Performance Shares, and 2,500,000 Class B Performance Shares, following shareholder approval and the completion of an acquisition on October 30, 2025. This change reflects a significant increase in the director’s indirect interest in the company, potentially impacting the company’s governance and shareholder dynamics.

More about Frontier Resources Limited

data.title: TA Corporation Ltd. Updates on Subsidiary Dissolution and Legal Settlement
data.description:
An update from TA Corporation Ltd. ( (SG:PA3) ) is now available.

TA Corporation Ltd. announced that its subsidiary, Tiong Aik Resources (S) Pte Ltd, was dissolved through a creditors’ voluntary winding up. Additionally, an out-of-court settlement was reached in legal proceedings involving Credence Engineering Pte. Ltd., with remedial works to be carried out by CEPL. The company does not foresee any material impact on its financial position from these developments. Trading of the company’s securities remains suspended since July 2023, and stakeholders are advised to exercise caution.

More about TA Corporation Ltd.

TA Corporation Ltd., incorporated in Singapore, operates in the construction and real estate industry, focusing on property development and engineering services. The company, along with its subsidiaries, provides a range of services including construction, real estate development, and engineering solutions.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: S$37.82M

Learn more about PA3 stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: EverChina Int’l Holdings Faces Further Delay in Transaction Circular Dispatch
data.description:
EverChina Int’l Holdings Company Ltd ( (HK:0202) ) has issued an update.

EverChina Int’l Holdings Company Limited has announced a further delay in the dispatch of a circular related to a major and connected transaction involving the acquisition of a property. Initially expected by 31 October 2025, the circular’s dispatch has been postponed to on or before 1 December 2025 due to the need for additional time to finalize certain information. This delay may impact shareholder decision-making and reflects ongoing challenges in completing the transaction.

More about EverChina Int’l Holdings Company Ltd

EverChina Int’l Holdings Company Limited is a Hong Kong-based company engaged in various sectors, including property investment and development, hotel operations, and securities trading. The company focuses on expanding its portfolio and market presence through strategic acquisitions and investments.

Average Trading Volume: 2,828,909

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: HK$1.09B

data.title: Cauldron Energy Issues New Shares Following Option Conversion
data.description:
An announcement from Cauldron Energy ( (AU:CXU) ) is now available.

Cauldron Energy Limited announced the issuance of 15,859 fully paid ordinary shares following the conversion of options. This move, conducted without disclosure to investors under the Corporations Act, signifies the company’s compliance with regulatory requirements and reflects its ongoing operational activities. The announcement, authorized by the company’s Director and Company Secretary, Michael Fry, highlights Cauldron’s adherence to legal provisions, potentially impacting its market presence and investor relations.

More about Cauldron Energy

Cauldron Energy Limited is a company operating in the energy sector, focusing on the exploration and development of uranium and other energy-related resources. It is listed on the Australian Securities Exchange under the ticker CXU.

data.title: SICC Co., Ltd. Announces Executive Director Resignation and New Appointment
data.description:
SICC Co.,Ltd. Class H ( (HK:2631) ) has provided an update.

SICC Co., Ltd. announced the resignation of Mr. Wang Junguo as an executive director due to changes in the company’s corporate governance structure. Despite stepping down from this role, Mr. Wang was elected as an employee representative director, effective immediately, highlighting his continued involvement with the company. This transition reflects an internal restructuring aimed at optimizing governance, with Mr. Wang’s extensive financial management experience likely to benefit the company’s strategic direction.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:2631) stock is a Buy with a HK$80.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on SICC Co.,Ltd. Class H stock, see the HK:2631 Stock Forecast page.

data.title: Borgosesia Launches New Securitization Operations and Acquires Residence San Rossore
data.description:
Borgosesia S.p.A. ( (IT:BO) ) has shared an update.

Borgosesia S.p.A. has initiated two new securitization operations, Janus and Euclide, aiming to raise a total of €170 million. The company also acquired the entire capital of Pisa S.R. S.r.l., the owner of Residence San Rossore, for an enterprise value of €7 million, enhancing its portfolio in a region with strong tourist appeal.

The most recent analyst rating on (IT:BO) stock is a Buy with a EUR2.50 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Borgosesia S.p.A. stock, see the IT:BO Stock Forecast page.

More about Borgosesia S.p.A.

Borgosesia S.p.A. is a company listed on Euronext Milan, specializing in investments in alternative assets. The company focuses on securitization operations and real estate investments.

data.title: Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. Announces Share Buyback to Enhance Capital Efficiency
data.description:
Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. ( (JP:8818) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. has announced a resolution by its Board of Directors to acquire up to 1,000,000 of its own shares through the Tokyo Stock Exchange’s off-auction trading system. This move aims to enhance capital efficiency and provide flexibility in capital policy, reflecting the company’s response to evolving market conditions.

The most recent analyst rating on (JP:8818) stock is a Buy with a Yen1934.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. stock, see the JP:8818 Stock Forecast page.

Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. operates in the real estate industry, focusing on the acquisition and management of properties. The company is known for its strategic approach to capital efficiency and adapting to changes in the business environment.
